body.p: The Board was sympathetic to those concerns. Accordingly, the Board adopted an approach that combines aspects of both approaches set out in paragraph BC140 by requiring that an entity recognise a group of insurance contracts from the earliest of:

li.p: the beginning of the coverage period of the group of contracts;
the date on which the first payment from a policyholder in the group becomes due; or
for a group of onerous contracts, when the group becomes onerous.
